channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Lab -- WP-Lister Lite for eBay
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Lab -- WP-Lister Lite for eBay

item.title: CVE-2024-22307|2024-01-31T16:49:28.498Z -- wp%20lab -- wp-lister%20lite%20for%20ebay
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Lab WP-Lister Lite for eBay allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP-Lister Lite for eBay: from n/a through 3.5.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-32836|2024-06-04T17:50:39.406Z -- wp%20lab -- wp-lister%20lite%20for%20ebay
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in WP Lab WP-Lister Lite for eBay.This issue affects WP-Lister Lite for eBay: from n/a through 3.5.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-32573|2024-06-04T17:50:34.067Z -- wp%20lab -- wp-lister%20lite%20for%20ebay
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Lab WP-Lister Lite for eBay allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP-Lister Lite for eBay: from n/a through 3.5.11.
